alert.note: Alert for Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 12 at 3:48PM EDT until March 14 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern New Haven County. In New Jersey, Western Bergen County. In New York, Rockland and Northern Westchester Counties. * WHEN...For the heavy snow, from Monday evening through Tuesday evening. For the strong winds, Tuesday morning into Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
